item.title: Help with gs stance server side
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

coocoobanana:

all of my anims are like emote id first[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 09, 2009, 01:51:57 pm[/size][hr]when i change them around it puts the gs over my shoulder

That’ll happen if you don’t have a client that doesn’t support major edits.
Try SilentCJ’s GS Tut. If you did, and that happens, then you should retry…
You can’t just use the anim IDs he supplies.

Read full topic

@baselm wrote:

It kindof puts the weapon across me
this my code:

return 2065; } if(id == 746 || id == 667 || id == 35 || id == 2402 || id == 8100) {

I added everything right in client i think[/quote]

if(id == 746 || id == 667 || id == 35 || id == 2402 || id == 8100) 
{
return 2065;
}

the emote id should be under the items id
